install.packages(pacman) pacman::p_load(tidyverse, jsonlite, patchwork, here, lubridate, update = FALSE) 1.2 activityã‚’ãƒ€ã‚¦ãƒ³ãƒ­ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ ã‚ã¨ã§æ›¸ã google takeout ã§æ¤œç´¢ 1.3 ã“ã“ã‹ã‚‰è§£æ 1.3.1 activityã®èª­ã¿è¾¼ã¿ android <- jsonlite::fromJSON(here("data/android_activity.json")) 1.3.2 èª­ã¿è¾¼ã‚“ã activityãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ã®æ¦‚è¦ç¢ºèª glimpse(android) ## Rows: 63,120 ## Columns: 5 ## $ header [3m[90m<chr>[39m[23m "ã³ã‚ˆãƒ¼ã‚“ã£ãŸãƒ¼ Pro", "Nova Launcher ãƒ›ãƒ¼ãƒ ", "Gmail", "Slack", "Nova Launcher ãƒ›ãƒ¼... ## $ title [3m[90m<chr>[39m[23m "ä½¿ç”¨: ã³ã‚ˆãƒ¼ã‚“ã£ãŸãƒ¼ Pro", "ä½¿ç”¨: Nova Launcher ãƒ›ãƒ¼ãƒ ", "ä½¿ç”¨: Gmail", "ä½¿ç”¨: Slack", "... ## $ titleUrl [3m[90m<chr>[39m[23m "https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.ABS104a.biyontterpro... ## $ time [3m[90m<chr>[39m[23m "2020-04-16T21:29:57.048Z", "2020-04-16T21:29:54.832Z", "2020-04-16T21:... ## $ products [3m[90m<list>[39m[23m ["Android", "Android", "Android", "Android", "Android", "Android", "An... 1.3.3 timeãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ã‚’å¤‰æ› android <- android %>% mutate(time = parse_datetime(time, locale = locale(tz = "Japan")) ) %>% mutate(date = lubridate::date(time), year = lubridate::year(time)) 1.3.4 å¹´æœˆã”ã¨ã®ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿æ•°ã®é›†è¨ˆ 2018å¹´8æœˆä»¥å‰ã®ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ãŒå°‘ãªã„ã€‚ activityãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ã®åé›†ãŒã†ã¾ãã„ã£ã¦ã„ãªã‹ã£ãŸï¼Ÿ android %>% group_by(year, month(date)) %>% count() ## # A tibble: 37 x 3 ## # Groups: year, month(date) [37] ## year `month(date)` n ## <dbl> <dbl> <int> ## 1 2016 12 2 ## 2 2017 1 1 ## 3 2017 2 56 ## 4 2017 3 26 ## 5 2017 5 6 ## 6 2017 6 64 ## 7 2017 7 12 ## 8 2017 8 29 ## 9 2017 9 32 ## 10 2017 11 4 ## # ... with 27 more rows android %>% count(date) %>% ggplot() + geom_line(aes(date,n)) + scale_x_date(breaks = "month", guide = guide_axis(n.dodge = 3)) 1.3.5 ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ã®æº–å‚™ 2019å¹´ã¨2020å¹´ã®ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ã®ã¿ã‚’ä½¿ã†ã“ã¨ã«ã™ã‚‹ã€‚ android_latest <- android %>% filter(year %in% c(2019, 2020)) ã‚¢ãƒ—ãƒªã®åå‰ãŒé•·ã„ã‹ã‚‰20æ–‡å­—ã¾ã§ã«ã™ã‚‹ã€‚ android_latest <- android_latest %>% mutate(header = if_else(str_length(header) >= 20, substr(header, 1, 20), header)) android <- android %>% mutate(header = if_else(str_length(header) >= 20, substr(header, 1, 20), header)) 1.3.6 ã‚¢ãƒ—ãƒªã®ä½¿ç”¨å›æ•°ï¼ˆ2019-2020ï¼‰ android_latest %>% count(header, sort = TRUE) %>% head(5) %>% mutate(header = fct_reorder(header, n)) %>% ggplot() + geom_col(aes(y = header, x = n)) + theme_minimal() + labs(title = "Most used Apps - Overall", subtitle = "Android Smartphone usage", caption = "Data:Google Takeout") 1.3.7 ã‚¢ãƒ—ãƒªã®ä½¿ç”¨å›æ•°ï¼ˆã™ã¹ã¦ã®å¹´ï¼‰ android %>% count(header, sort = TRUE) %>% head(5) %>% mutate(header = fct_reorder(header, n)) %>% ggplot() + geom_col(aes(y = header, x = n)) + theme_minimal() + labs(title = "Most used Apps - Overall", subtitle = "Android Smartphone usage", caption = "Data:Google Takeout") 1.3.8 æ¯”è¼ƒï¼ˆ2019 vs 2020ï¼‰ android_latest %>% filter(year %in% '2019') %>% group_by(year, header) %>% summarise(n = n()) %>% arrange(desc(n)) %>% head(5) %>% #View() mutate(header = fct_reorder(header, n)) %>% ggplot() + geom_col(aes(y = header, x = n)) + # facet_wrap(~year, scales = "free") + theme_minimal() + labs(title = "Most used Apps - 2019", subtitle = "Android Smartphone usage", caption = "Data:Google Takeout") -> p2019 android_latest %>% filter(year %in% '2020') %>% group_by(year, header) %>% summarise(n = n()) %>% arrange(desc(n)) %>% head(5) %>% #View() mutate(header = fct_reorder(header, n)) %>% ggplot() + geom_col(aes(y = header, x = n)) + # facet_wrap(~year, scales = "free") + theme_minimal() + labs(title = "Most used Apps - 2020", subtitle = "Android Smartphone usage", caption = "Data:Google Takeout") -> p2020 p2019 / p2020
